name: Dota Heroes image Classifier (AI, ML, NN)
body:
Used tensorflow to train a neural network, using google’s «Inception» search engine as base, to recognize dota heroes at any given image. An example with a fish below. https://github.com/soprof/ML_playground
It somehow works already, needs a better training data(I only used it the heroes avatars and duplicated them 30 times), was thinking to parse some website with hero wallpapers for better data.
Feel free to email/pm me if you are believe it’s fun or you want to contribute.

http://i.imgur.com/lLTHJ7E.png
![fish](http://i.imgur.com/lLTHJ7E.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
